page.title: 05LANDSCAPE
page.content: Mr.Hunt designed his house and has done most of the building work. He used mainly old materials so it looks as if it dates from 1784.The oakbeams on the lounge ceiling are 300 years old and come from an old ship. The bricks are 200 years old and some haave footprints of animals on them.The chimney pots and tiles are over 60 years old .He bought these materials from a special shop in Coventry and an old school.Owing to building regulations he used new wood for the staircese and roof. The half acre site was one of eight plots given by Thomas Orral to his employees 200 years ago to grow vegetables.The house has facilities such as modern plumbing and electricity bbbut still has an attractive olden look to it.
